title: Apple Watch Series 4 hands-on
description: Apple unveiled its Apple Watch Series 4 line of smartwatches today and the changes are immediately obvious. Its the first major design overhaul of the Watch since its debut more than three years ago. The Watchs screen now goes nearly edge-to-edge, thanks to a larger display which also lets watchOS 5 show more information through Apples built-in app complications.
